column4: fwiw, I was leaning towards duplicity, but wasn't sure. i have to back up a RAID array onto smaller drives
duplicity is the rsync on steroids one, right?

haven't done enough reading on it. what I really need is the appropriate scripts. rsync meets all my needs, but I don't have the ability to write the scripts to call it to do the backups/restores and keep track of everything
hey, maybe backintime would work for you, too -- i think it has a command-line version :)
